RADIUS - Static variable in class structures.WarpPoint
The Radius of all WarpPoints.
randomDouble(double, double) - Static method in class structures.CalcHelp
Randomly calculates a double in the range [a, b) with a completely random distribution.
randomInteger(int, int) - Static method in class structures.CalcHelp
Randomly calculates an int in the range [a, b) with a completely random distribution.
